page.title: 19Leisure in Leafield.
page.content: In her spare time my mum does cooking, gardening and housework, sewing and patchwork and she's a Guider.My dad does woodwork, painting and cycling.My brother does reading, playing with his friends and watching T.V.I do cycling, cooking, going to Guides and playing with my friends. The most popular hobbies in our area are gardening and horse-riding. Most people went to Wales last year for their holiday.Most of them stayed on a campsite. One lady in our village does flower-arranging,another does archaeology. There are several clubs in our village.Here are some of them: bingo, W.I.,youth club, Brownies, darts,Aunt Sally and the Evergreens. We like playing the A-team and hopscotch.
